Name: Death VI
Desc:
Your contract with the reaper is complete. The Reaper will follow you, and once it has collected a certain number of souls, it will reveal its true self and attack a wide area.
Every time the Reaper defeats an enemy with its attacks or the Reaperâ€™s scythe, the Reaper will collect their soul. When it collects a large amount of souls, it can use them as food to unleash a more powerful attack.
If the Reaper attacks an enemy using Damage Reflect, it will deal damage.
When the skill is used, the effects are activated and when it is re-used, they are deactivated On/off skilll
Required Skill: Death Contract Lv. 1 or above
